item.title: RESOLVED: Issues Loading the Wix Editor
item.content:encoded:
Dec 4, 00:10 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. We thank you for your patience and understanding as we worked to resolve this issue. In case your Editor is still not loading, please make sure to clear your browser cache, or use an incognito window.

https://support.wix.com/en/article/clearing-your-browsers-cache

Dec 3, 19:56 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. In case your Editor is still not loading, please make sure to clear your browser cache, or use an incognito window.

https://support.wix.com/en/article/clearing-your-browsers-cache

Dec 3, 19:07 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 3, 18:44 UTC
Investigating - We are aware of the return of the original issue: some website owners may experience issues when accessing the website editor.

Dec 3, 12:20 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Dec 3, 07:04 UTC
Investigating - Some website owners may experience issues when accessing the website editor.

item.title: RESOLVED: We're investigating a potential issue with wixstudio.io sites not loading.
item.content:encoded:
Nov 9, 22:47 UTC
Resolved - This issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience and understanding as we worked to resolve this issue.

Nov 9, 21:26 UTC
Update - The team is working with the DNS provider to resolve the issue. Until resolved we created a workaround in order for you to view the live site using a temporary free site URL https://account-name.wixsite.com/site-name. To access your free studio live site, please replace wixstudio.io with wixsite.com in the URL.

You can continue to create, edit, and preview sites in the editor. Premium sites are not affected.

Nov 9, 20:23 UTC
Identified - We're investigating an issue with free wixstudio.io sites not loading, caused by a DNS error.  
The team is working on a workaround to view live free sites and with the DNS provider to resolve the issue.

Nov 9, 18:43 UTC
Investigating - Our engineers are currently investigating an issue affecting wixstudio.io sites. Check back here for updates.

Investigating - We’re working on it.
